item.title: 'Squad' wants U.S. to butt out of Spain's embargo of weapons bound for Israel
item.description: Congress' left-wing "Squad" demanded an end to a U.S.-led investigation into Spain's embargo of weapon shipments bound for Israel.

item.title: Americans are tuning out political news, new poll finds
item.description: Nearly two-thirds of Americans have limited their consumption of political news, a new poll has found.
